pr_title: fix websocket JPMS warnings and build issues

timeline.bodyText: Please put requires in alphabetical order, ignoring the transitive keyword.
timeline.author: sbordet

timeline.bodyText: Because you requires transitive core.common, you won't need to requires transitive again .io and .util
timeline.author: sbordet

timeline.message:
fix websocket JPMS warnings and build issues
